networksession-desc: Adds a SessionProvider based on configured ip address and secret token
networksession-only-api-request: NetworkSession auth is only valid for api requests.
networksession-only-https: NetworkSession auth is only valid for https requests.
networksession-invalid-config-ip-ranges: Configured ip_ranges in NetworkSessionProvider must be an array.
networksession-invalid-config-token: Configured token in NetworkSessionProvider must be a string.
networksession-invalid-config-username: Configured username in NetworkSessionProvider must be a string.
networksession-invalid-config-multiple-m: Multiple configured users matched the request, but only one is allowed.
networksession-no-token-match: Provided NetworkSession auth token failed to authenticate.
